channel.title: Retirement on Relaxed Income
channel.description: Recent content in Retirement on Relaxed Income

item.title: Passive income aggressive retirement
item.description: Leveraging passive income to create an aggressive retirement Retirement today looks much different than it did decades ago. With increasing life expectancies, many people running hobbies as businesses, and the rise of peer-to-peer investing, there are many options to consider on how to fund and support a retirement. Here we will discuss how passive income can be leveraged to create an aggressive retirement, no matter your financial position. What is passive income?
